title: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish a distinctive Lucille Ball plate
summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish a distinctive Lucille Ball plate.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          853

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  YOUNG  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating the
         Lucille Ball distinctive plate

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  vehicle  and  traffic law is amended by adding a new
    2  section 404-x to read as follows:
    3    S 404-X. DISTINCTIVE LUCILLE BALL PLATES. 1. ANY  PERSON  RESIDING  IN
    4  THIS  STATE  SHALL, UPON REQUEST, BE ISSUED A DISTINCTIVE PLATE HONORING
    5  LUCILLE BALL OF A DESIGN APPROVED BY THE COMMISSIONER,  IN  CONSULTATION
    6  WITH  THE  LUCILLE  BALL-DESI  ARNAZ  CENTER. APPLICATION FOR SUCH PLATE
    7  SHALL BE FILED WITH THE COMMISSIONER IN SUCH  FORM  AND  DETAIL  AS  THE
    8  COMMISSIONER SHALL PRESCRIBE.
    9    2. A DISTINCTIVE PLATE ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION SHALL BE ISSUED
   10  IN  THE  SAME  MANNER AS OTHER NUMBER PLATES UPON PAYMENT OF THE REGULAR
   11  REGISTRATION FEE PRESCRIBED BY SECTION FOUR HUNDRED ONE OF THIS ARTICLE;
   12  PROVIDED,  HOWEVER,  THAT  AN  ADDITIONAL  ANNUAL  SERVICE   CHARGE   OF
   13  TWENTY-FIVE DOLLARS SHALL BE CHARGED FOR SUCH PLATE. SUCH ANNUAL SERVICE
   14  CHARGE  SHALL  BE DEPOSITED, PURSUANT TO SECTION FOUR HUNDRED FOUR-OO OF
   15  THIS ARTICLE, TO THE CREDIT OF THE DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLES DISTINC-
   16  TIVE PLATE DEVELOPMENT FUND, ESTABLISHED BY SECTION NINETY-FIVE-G OF THE
   17  STATE FINANCE LAW, AND SHALL BE USED FOR THE PRODUCTION, DESIGN,  ADVER-
   18  TISING  AND  MARKETING  OF  DISTINCTIVE  PLATES PURSUANT TO SUCH SECTION
   19  NINETY-FIVE-G.
   20    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02635-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating the Lucille Ball distinctive plate
